en.tip-srm-index: EBM Index is formulated with a mix of three parameters: popularity, activity, and engagement
en.tip-progression: The progress of the score, positive or negative, from one week to another
en.tip-popularity: Popularity measures the level of public attention on each social recruitment account (i.e. number of followers).
en.tip-activity: Activity scales the dynamics of social recruitment exercises, in terms of the frequency on generating various quality contents to reach out the “fans”.
en.tip-engagement: Engagement measures the level of interaction between accounts and followers, also, how likely the followers are involved in this well-established social media community.

zh.tip-srm-index: EBM 指数由雇主在社交招聘平台的“影响力”、“活跃度”、以及“互动粘性”三项指标组成。
zh.tip-progression: 我们以星期为单位收集有效数据，兼顾正负参数，指标权重会因此产生浮动。
zh.tip-popularity: 指衡量此社交招聘号吸引社会关注度的水平。代表了雇主发表的社交招聘的内容所能企及的人数和范围，简而言之，就是“粉丝基础”
zh.tip-activity: 指衡量社交招聘相关内容更新的动态，意味着您招聘内容接触粉丝的频率和程度
zh.tip-engagement: 指衡量社交招聘活动和内容与粉丝互动的程度，即粉丝参与到企业社交招聘社群中来的意愿指数
zh.no-org-cta: 点击这里 加入榜单吧
